messages.content: I'm sorry you needed to add this. I thought your humour was pretty obvious, but this is reddit....
I always move back and always regret it.
I see notifications of people commenting the source but this sub must auto delete or something. Sorry, guys. I binged her and found me quick though.
Same. You all tried to save me, but I rewatched with the sound on and... I have regrets.
Sorry I dropped this /sノ( ゜-゜ノ)
want* a source on that, sorry.
I'm sorry that's what you read because it isn't what I said.
Just be honest with this person. Sorry I didn’t read the whole thing I don’t have time rn :(
Sorry misunderstood you! I’m talking about viruses and bacteria that can kill you like the flu etc
I’m sorry but [NAME] has better memes
I’m more sorry that there are actual [NAME] fans...
Read his post again. 'It's more fact based than Fox.' I'm sorry but you might have some extra chromosomes.
Sorry for the bad analogy, yours is way better
I felt the same guilt when I stopped believing in [NAME]
As an [NAME], I apologize for the cranky old conservatives who are probably making ridiculously uninformed comments about your country right now :/
Sorry, but anarcho-anything are bot welcome there
I'm sorry you fell for the carnie, bro.
This cheat... what would that be? I may have made a choice I'm currently regretting.
I’m sorry you have to deal with that
Right like interacting with each other having a normal evening? Ugh they’re both so trashy I’m sorry.
I’m sorry to be that guy, but I don’t get it
[NAME]... I'm sorry. This is just wrong. I, can't.
I only watch bad animes sorry
Sorry. I know I should be grateful and happy.
I’m always reminded by my relatives on my birthday asking me if I have a girlfriend yet. Sorry bro ima yeet out of the social norm.
I’m so sorry the internet has inconvenienced you
Okay, I'll try to find one. Sorry about that.
I do feel sorry for the squirrel, but I wouldn't say the dog is a jerk for acting on natural instinct.
No one ever laid on their death bed and said, “I regret not working even harder.”
I have a bad feeling I’m gonna regret not tuning into this
I feel sorry for people that think Reddit (or even some random sub-reddit) is "an international stage".
That feeling when your mascot is there but none of his players. Sorry Youppi
I’m sorry to hear that friend :(. It’s for the best most likely if she didn’t accept you for who you are
Sorry to hear about that and hope you have moved on.
This.. im sorry but this is a dumb reply. Ofc it was fake kindness golly
That sucks man, I'm sorry. Things will get better, they always do in the end
Oh sorry my bad, didmt know
And [NAME], would again like to apologize for any misunderstanding.
I'm sorry it happened like that for you. I really can't imagine.
Sorry you had to live there. Good news is they are demolishing it in 2020.
Sorry my teams gave you your only two losses this season ;)
Sorry, but [NAME] is too POWERFUL, not to be his own character. But seriously i definitely now want this.
[NAME]: I'm sorry that happened. I hope you weren't totally friendless on your 30th!
Then I’m sorry but this game really isn’t for you. Progression like that would ruin the base of what this game is.
I thought that was gonna be the Pelicans after [NAME] is gone(sorry Pelicans fans)
It was a terrible, terrible thing to do. He did every day of his time for it, has expressed regret, and has not repeated it.
Sorry if this has been covered a bunch but what happened on the play where [NAME] got injured?
EDIT: wrong link sorry here’s the right one I hope
They literally don’t have enough time on the planet to regret their actions.
I’m sorry. Can you please explain what are the 2 accounts of the order of creation are contradictory?
You still didn’t answer the question. Sorry it’s bugging me :)
I'm sorry to hear this. I hope you can find something to make you feel happy in the new year.
I'm sorry your trust has been that badly broken.
just apologize. what other advice could you possibly require? you fucked up, now deal with it.
Sorry I forgot you guys beat Pitt. Congrats on your 2 win season.
Ugh I'm sorry man! Jerk off until your heart is content and don't apologize for it!
Sorry for your loss yesterday. Your team is poised to do even better in the years to come and hopefully they will.
>Sorry, but any city that had any kind of ~~epidemic in its~~ history will have bunches of dead people buried under it.
Oh dear, I'm so sorry you are going through this. I don't have any sage advice but I hope things get better for you.
Sorry to be the bearer of bad tidings.
I’m really sorry about your situation :( Although I love the names Sapphira, Cirilla, and Scarlett!
Don’t regret the time, had it been sooner you might be absent a kid or three!
Wow I’m sorry. Can you take pictures of your bruises? What was she nagging you about?
Omg I just looked it up and all the places look so beautiful there 😍 also I’m sorry that it’s homophobic
It's racism. It doesn't make me angry, it makes me feel sorry for their ignorance and yours.
So America and the USSR are the exact same thing to you? Sorry you're so small minded, hope you learn to grow in the future.
Got it. Sorry you feel that way man. I hope you find your own way to impact the game or enjoy it next year.
I'm really sorry for your loss friend. I hope everything is okay on your end too.
I’m sorry :(. Lol. For me, after the ending of 3, and Andromeda, I have zero interest in ME.
Sorry you can’t enjoy things cause other people enjoy them lol. Your loss
I'm sorry, I can't hear your useless badgering over me drinking my 38' from a wine bottle and enjoying my extra $200.
Sorry I'm a reddit noob but why do I get notifications of comments on my thread but then they disappear and I can't read them? Lol
Holy bait-and-switch, [NAME]. I’m so sorry, that has to be incredibly stressful to have to be around and deal with.
Damn, I really been playing this series all my life...and I ain’t got any regrets.
Lots of internalized rage and mom guilt daily leading to a good shower cry once a week or so.
That has gotten me killed a few times lately.
As a Ringwraith this offends me. Please build me a snowfort.
I've always wanted one of those but like worry it'll make a huge mess in my washer
He’s 60 and never had a HC gig. That should worry folks!
Yes of mine worry, no one liked mine either.
It's going to get awfully dark and cold at night.
I want to go scuba diving so bad, but swimming in anything bigger than a pool terrifies me.
I have the worst memory ever. Idk if it's from all the weed I smoked but I also have a blank mind like all the time.
Oh, it's definitely working and that worries me a lot.
Unemployed now re: those crummy health issues. So that probably helped.
